verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
I have not much to offer You
not mere what You deserve
but still I come because Your cross
has placed in me my worth

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Oh Christ my King of sympathy
whose wounds secure my peace
Your grace extends to call me friend
Your mercy sets me free

verse.name: c1c
verse.lines:
And I know I'm weak
I know I'm unworthy
to call upon Your name
but because of grace
because of Your mercy
I stand here unashamed

verse.name: c1d
verse.lines:
I can't explain this kind of love
I'm humbled and amazed that You'd come down from heaven's heights
and greet me face to face

verse.name: c1e
verse.lines: Here I am at Your feet in my brokeness complete
